Rules.InvariantScript: If(showFilterLocation, Set(showFilterLocation, false), Set(showSortingLocation, false); Set(showFilterLocation, true));
If(showSortingLocation, Set(showSortingLocation, false), Set(showSortingLocation, true);Set(showFilterLocation, false));

If(sortByAvaPhyLocation,
    SortByColumns(
        Filter('Inventory onhand mobile entry (mserp)',
            'GUID string type' = userId &&
            AggregateType = 'InventInventoryOnHandMobileAggregateType (mserp)'.Location && 
            Site = selectedProductSite && 
            Warehouse = selectedProductWarehouse && 
            Size = selectedProductSize &&
            Color = selectedProductColor && 
            Style = selectedProductStyle && 
            Configuration = selectedProductConfiguration &&
            'Available physical' >= minAvaPhyLocation &&
            (maxAvaPhyLocation = 0 || 'Available physical' <= maxAvaPhyLocation)
        ),
        "mserp_availphysical", SortOrder.Descending
    ),
    SortByColumns(
        Filter('Inventory onhand mobile entry (mserp)',
            'GUID string type' = userId &&
            AggregateType = 'InventInventoryOnHandMobileAggregateType (mserp)'.Location && 
            Site = selectedProductSite && 
            Warehouse = selectedProductWarehouse && 
            Size = selectedProductSize &&
            Color = selectedProductColor && 
            Style = selectedProductStyle && 
            Configuration = selectedProductConfiguration &&
            'Available physical' >= minAvaPhyLocation &&
            (maxAvaPhyLocation = 0 || 'Available physical' <= maxAvaPhyLocation)
        ),
        "mserp_wmslocationid"
    )
)

If(IsBlank(ThisItem.Size), "", Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_Size & ": " & ThisItem.Size & "     ") &
If(IsBlank(ThisItem.Color), "", Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_Color & ": " & ThisItem.Color & "     ") &
If(IsBlank(ThisItem.Style), "", Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_Style & ": " & ThisItem.Style & "     ") &
If(IsBlank(ThisItem.Configuration), "", Loc.Labels.msdyn_scm_Config & ": " & ThisItem.Configuration & "     ")
